column1: [{"classname": "Andorra", "def_wiki": "A tiny country in Europe, between Spain and France. Official name: Principality of Andorra", "path_wn": ["Andorra"], "def_wn": "a small republic in the eastern Pyrenees between Spain and France"}, {"classname": "United Arab Emirates", "def_wiki": "A country in Western Asia, in the Middle East.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Afghanistan", "def_wiki": "A landlocked country between Central and South Asia. Official name: Islamic Republic of Afghanistan", "path_wn": ["Afghanistan"], "def_wn": "a mountainous landlocked country in central Asia; bordered by Iran to the west and Russia to the north and Pakistan to the east and south"}, {"classname": "Antigua and Barbuda", "def_wiki": "A country in the Caribbean, consisting of the islands of Antigua and Barbuda.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Anguilla", "def_wiki": "A British overseas territory in the Caribbean.", "path_wn": ["Anguilla"], "def_wn": "a British colony in the West Indies"}, {"classname": "Albania", "def_wiki": "A country in southeastern Europe. Official name: Republic of Albania.", "path_wn": ["Albania"], "def_wn": "a republic in southeastern Europe on the Adriatic coast of the Balkan Peninsula"}, {"classname": "Armenia", "def_wiki": "Ancient kingdom in the Armenian Highland southeast of Black Sea and southwest of Caspian Sea; area now divided between Turkey, Republic of Armenia, Azerbaijan, Georgia and Iran.", "path_wn": ["Armenia"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia; formerly an Asian soviet; modern Armenia is but a fragment of ancient Armenia which was one of the world's oldest civilizations; throughout 2500 years the Armenian people have been invaded and oppressed by their neighbors"}, {"classname": "Angola", "def_wiki": "A country in Southern Africa", "path_wn": ["Angola"], "def_wn": "a republic in southwestern Africa on the Atlantic Ocean; achieved independence from Portugal in 1975 and was the scene of civil war until 1990"}, {"classname": "Antarctica", "def_wiki": "The southernmost continent, south of the Southern Ocean, containing the South Pole.", "path_wn": ["Antarctica"], "def_wn": "an extremely cold continent at the south pole almost entirely below the Antarctic Circle; covered by an ice cap up to 13,000 feet deep"}, {"classname": "Argentina", "def_wiki": "A country in South America. Official name: Argentine Republic.", "path_wn": ["Argentina"], "def_wn": "a republic in southern South America; second largest country in South America"}, {"classname": "Austria", "def_wiki": "A country in Central Europe, a member state of the European Union. Official name: Republic of Austria", "path_wn": ["Austria"], "def_wn": "a mountainous republic in central Europe; under the Habsburgs (1278-1918) Austria maintained control of the Holy Roman Empire and was a leader in European politics until the 19th century"}, {"classname": "Australia", "def_wiki": "A country in Oceania. Official name: Commonwealth of Australia.", "path_wn": ["Australia"], "def_wn": "a nation occupying the whole of the Australian continent; Aboriginal tribes are thought to have migrated from southeastern Asia 20,000 years ago; first Europeans were British convicts sent there as a penal colony"}, {"classname": "Aruba", "def_wiki": "An autonomous territory of the Caribbean, a constituent country of the Kingdom of the Netherlands.", "path_wn": ["Aruba"], "def_wn": "a popular island resort in the Netherlands Antilles"}, {"classname": "Aland Islands", "def_wiki": "A contiguous area of land, smaller than a continent, totally surrounded by water.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Azerbaijan", "def_wiki": "A country in the South Caucasus region of Eurasia; official name: Republic of Azerbaijan", "path_wn": ["Azerbaijan"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia; formerly an Asian soviet"}, {"classname": "Bosnia and Herzegovina", "def_wiki": "A country on the Balkan Peninsula which has the capital Sarajevo and which, until 1992, was part of Yugoslavia.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Barbados", "def_wiki": "An island and country in the Caribbean.", "path_wn": ["Barbados"], "def_wn": "a parliamentary democracy on the island of Barbados; former British colony; a popular resort area"}, {"classname": "Bangladesh", "def_wiki": "A country in South Asia. Official name: People's Republic of Bangladesh.", "path_wn": ["Bangladesh"], "def_wn": "a Muslim republic in southern Asia bordered by India to the north and west and east and the Bay of Bengal to the south; formerly part of India and then part of Pakistan; it achieved independence in 1971"}, {"classname": "Belgium", "def_wiki": "A country in Western Europe that has borders with the Netherlands, Germany, Luxembourg and France.", "path_wn": ["Belgium"], "def_wn": "a monarchy in northwestern Europe; headquarters for the European Union and for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization"}, {"classname": "Burkina Faso", "def_wiki": "A country in West Africa. Official name: Burkina Faso. Formerly Upper Volta.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Bulgaria", "def_wiki": "A country in Southeastern Europe. Official name: Republic of Bulgaria", "path_wn": ["Bulgaria"], "def_wn": "a republic in the eastern part of the Balkan Peninsula in southeastern Europe"}, {"classname": "Bahrain", "def_wiki": "A country in the Middle East. Official name: Kingdom of Bahrain.", "path_wn": ["Bahrain"], "def_wn": "an island in the Persian Gulf"}, {"classname": "Benin", "def_wiki": "A country in West Africa, formerly Dahomey.", "path_wn": ["Benin"], "def_wn": "a country on western coast of Africa; formerly under French control"}, {"classname": "Bermuda", "def_wiki": "An island group in the North Atlantic Ocean, 580 nautical miles (1074 kilometers) east-southeast of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina, held as an Overseas Territory by Britain", "path_wn": ["Bermuda"], "def_wn": "a group of islands in the Atlantic off the Carolina coast; British colony; a popular resort"}, {"classname": "Brunei Darussalam", "def_wiki": "The official name of Brunei.", "path_wn": "", "def_wn": ""}, {"classname": "Bolivia", "def_wiki": "A card game similar to rummy and canasta.", "path_wn": ["Bolivia"], "def_wn": "a landlocked republic in central South America; Simon Bolivar founded Bolivia in 1825 after winning independence from Spain"}
